basics.name: Ratko Simidzija
basics.label: JavaScript Developer
basics.summary: JavaScript Developer with five years of experience building e-commerce platforms, trading applications, and modern web solutions. Specializing in React, TypeScript, and full-stack development with Remix. Strong focus on web accessibility standards and E2E testing. Previously worked in Business Management before transitioning to web development in 2020.

work.name: ePages

Build and maintain Commerce Cockpit, a merchant admin platform with 50+ views for managing products, orders, and customers
Write unit tests with Jest and E2E tests with Cypress and Playwright to ensure code quality across platforms
Work within a monorepo architecture managing multiple interconnected packages and shared component libraries
Collaborate with design and backend teams to deliver features in two-week sprints
